Global climate patterns are rapidly changing due to rising global average temperatures, raising the issue of using fossil fuels. The world will invest heavily in research and development of technologies that do not use fossil fuels. These technologies will later aid in production activities when humans settle on alien planets. Annual revenue increases at startup.

The leakage of pollutants into the air, soil, and water has resulted in the destruction of the natural environment and ecosystem. The world has placed the cause of the problem in plastics, which use fossil fuels as the main raw material and are working to develop materials that can replace plastics. These efforts will help utilize resources when humans later settle on alien planets. Research amount is increased at the start.

Since the 19th century, human civilization has developed a form of relying heavily on fossil fuels. Still, as fossil fuels are being depleted faster than the speed at which they are formed, the problem of resource depletion has been raised. The world will strive to use natural resources and renewable energy. These efforts will help us use resources when humans settle on alien planets later. Resource amount is increased at the start.

A legendary rock band, a hip-hop song that sings about the dark inner side, and a dance singer popular with the public with elegant looks and dance moves, etc., introduce the country's culture abroad.

A unique drawing that started in an archipelago in the past has created mania all over the world. Citizens who are fascinated by the culture accept unique drawings as their technology and create more cultural content.
Those who believe that a player's country's fashion is stylish will use the dress of their citizens' country as a standard of style.

Films set in that country are produced in the player's country. All productions speak the player's language, and citizens fascinated by these films will seek out productions from your country to see films set in that country. The effect increases as the player's culture overwhelms the country.

In the media, certain images such as martial arts, origami, and the mafia are imprinted on certain ethnic groups. Citizens see nothing other than the imprinted image of their nation. The effect increases as the player's culture overwhelms the country.

In war movies, hero movies, etc., the most powerful and just characters always come from the player's country. Citizens of that country regard the player country as a righteous country and think little of their country. The effect increases as the player's culture overwhelms the country.

Announce that the country's historical and cultural origins are all in the player's country. This either evades academic scrutiny or undergoes custom scrutiny from player countries and exposes them to the media. If the player's culture doesn't overwhelm the country, it will backfire.

It airs movies, dramas, etc. that demean the country's royalty, nobility, culture, etc., and idolize the history of the player's country. If the player's culture doesn't overwhelm the country, it will backfire.

Pressure or bribe politicians in the country for subjugation. A squeezed politician will try to reduce the number of antagonists in the player country. If the player's culture doesn't overwhelm the country, it will backfire.

Under the guise of justice, humans with ordinary appetites are sacrificed for extreme animal protection. In order to prevent violence against animals, they inflict abusive language and assault on humans, causing internal conflict in the country.
Incitement to hatred of the weak

Creates and popularizes derogatory words for the elderly, women, and the disabled, and induces feelings of displeasure toward them. Citizens who demean them use their emotions as an objective indicator, regard demeaning as justice, and fail to recognize that there is anything wrong with their actions. This creates internal conflict in the country.

It spawns groups that use the name of feminism to gain political supremacy. Deliberately provocative remarks inform their existence and the honour of the original feminism. They cause internal conflict in the country.

They form a group of pagans who reject God's creation and laws and believe only their own eyes are true. They distort the truth of God by editing the contents published in the academic world to suit their purposes. The country defends against these conspiracy theories with national strength.

It embellishes the phenomenon of gender imbalance as a story that can be applied to all countries. It causes distrust among citizens and induces a decrease in the marriage rate and low birth rate, which damages the national power of the country in the long term.

The story of a government conspiracy that could be used as movie material gives you faith that it happens in reality. Conspiracy theories lack evidence to support them, but they sound so convincing to non-experts that they distrust the government under all circumstances and suspect the involvement of certain forces.
When you start exploring, you can acquire land with minerals to be mined. Or you may encounter another country founded by your competitor.

Adjust the planet's atmosphere to create the right atmospheric pressure. You can increase or decrease the amount of waiting by investing money. Atmospheric pressure affects a planet's temperature, water cycle, and carbon cycle. The ideal air pressure is 1013.25 hPa.

Create the right temperature for life to settle. A planet's temperature affects the water cycle. Because the heat entering and leaving a planet is in equilibrium, the temperature change caused by the investment of money is temporary. The ideal temperature is 15â„ƒ.

Water is essential for life to survive. Water in its liquid state allows life to begin to settle, while water in its gaseous state causes a temperature rise and has a negligible effect on the rise in air pressure. You can adjust the water volume to the ideal amount by referring to the graph.

Carbon is a basic material for life and also a material for civilization. Investing money can control the influx of carbon into the atmosphere, but high concentrations of carbon entering the atmosphere cause a rise in temperature.

You can invest your money to get seeds from the Earth. Organisms are affected by liquid water, atmospheric pressure, temperature, and the stability of the carbon cycle. Photosynthetic organisms produce oxygen.

You can invest your money to get seeds from the Earth. Organisms are affected by liquid water, atmospheric pressure, temperature, and the stability of the carbon cycle. Breathing organisms need oxygen to survive.
This is the most basic form of power generation.
Nuclear fission energy is used to generate electricity in large quantities.
There would be no blackouts if there were.
increase access to citizens in need of food.
increase the quality and yield of agricultural products.
Manage food distribution to stabilize supply.
Increase public awareness of the disease.
Physicians trained intensively in one area contribute to lower mortality rates.
Minimize emergency patients who died while waiting for treatment.
Increase patient capacity and provide expert care.
Provide better health care through disease and treatment research.
This is a firefighting facility with emergency response capability.
Raise awareness of safety incidents that can occur in living and industrial environments.
Quickly scout hard-to-reach areas and conduct rescue operations.
Establish a safety management system and deploy efficient safety activities.
Punish misdemeanours and mediate civil conflicts.
Conduct emergency response and strengthen police power.
Prevent crime by strengthening the power of binding on criminals.
Investigate and find hidden criminals and enforce laws without discrimination against all criminals.
Accelerate law enforcement by analyzing a criminal's behavioural tendencies and the likelihood of committing a crime and sharing information with detectives under investigation.
Provides the water needed to maintain the facility.
It removes contaminants and supplies clean water.
Install pumps to increase water pressure and pipe all private spaces in the facility.
It is an automated water treatment plant that requires minimal management.
Install conduits to collect used wastewater from the facility.
Remove contaminants from wastewater to increase reusability.
Segregation of sewage and wastewater conduits enables effective decontamination.
Utilizes adapted microorganisms to purify difficult-to-treat contaminants.
It is a citizen's work space for production activities.
It is a space equipped with facilities to process resources and produce products.
A factory where the production process is automated using machines.
Increase the number of industrial facilities to produce more varieties of goods.
Construct state-of-the-art industrial facilities befitting the modern era.
It is a factory with an automatic management system.
We provide the education necessary for basic studies and life.
Storing accessible records and information to provide citizens with knowledge.
We train talented people by conducting education on advanced studies.
We foster experts by educating advanced technologies and academics.
We provide an environment where students can study in-depth subjects such as engineering, science, sociology, and economics.
For safety reasons, experiments that could not be done on the mother planet are conducted on the new planet.
Study the particles that make up all matter.
Study of the fission of atomic nuclei.
Study the bonding forces of atomic nuclei.
Study the smallest unit of matter.
Study the process by which light atoms combine into heavy atoms.
We study the basic theories dealing with the microscopic world.
Study the space in which gravity acts.
Study particles that mediate forces between two particles.
Study microorganisms that grow in anoxia.
Study microorganisms that adapt to their surroundings.
Research devices that energize and perform specific actions.
Researches machines powered by fuel explosions in cylinders.
Research equipment operated by electrical signals.
Study programs that will make electronic equipment work.
We study artificial intelligence that learns user characteristics in real time.
It is the idea of governing the people by law.
The theory is that the content of experience becomes the content of Cognition.
It is a political ideology that gives absolute power to the monarch.
It is an idea that doubts the absoluteness of truth and does not want to make an ultimate judgment.
It is a philosophy that emphasizes the subjective existence of man as an individual
It is the idea that a thing or phenomenon does not exist or is recognized and has no value.
It is an idea that sees life as unhappy and impossible to reform or progress.
It is the idea that the ruler's power is sacred from God.
It is an ideology that recognizes the dignity of individual personality and seeks to develop individuality voluntarily.
An idea that denies the absolute validity of truth or value and views everything as relative.
It is an ideology that values national independence and unification the most.
It is an idea that increases the wealth of the country and places importance on commerce.
It is a foreign policy oriented towards the acquisition and maintenance of colonies.
It is an idea that values human existence and values human ability, character, and present hope and happiness.
It is an idea to follow basic rules and laws.
It is an ideology that oppresses individual freedom under the ideology that all activities of individuals exist only for the existence and development of the whole, such as the nation and the nation.
It is an aggressionist idea to build a great nation by conquering other countries or peoples with superior military and economic power.
It is an idea that respects the interests of the group rather than individual interests.
It is an ideology that recognizes the value of an individual to the nation or society.
The idea of recognizing or judging things based on reason or logical validity.
It is an ideology that removes religious influence from social systems or their operation, and distinguishes and recognizes the independent spheres of secular and religious areas.
It is an idea that claims that actual results are the criterion for judging truth.
It is an idea to break the existing order and reform society with the power of reason for the infinite progress of mankind.
The person in charge of the terraforming team, most experts, serves as the leader.
One person becomes the Sovereign Sovereign of the State and has efficient decision-making authority.
All members of society are sovereign in governing the country.
It realizes an ideal form of society in which the monarch who rules the country has the most power.
Recognizes the constitutional separation of powers between monarch and parliament.
It is a republic in which the privileged nobility has the right to rule and command.
A society ruled by a minority with popular support in the form of a popular vote or the like.
Foreign development and security enhancement through military power are the most important purposes of the state.
Abolish private property institutions and socialize the means of production.
The people have power and exercise that power themselves.
Privileged bureaucrats seize and rule state power.
A system of governance based on a master-servant relationship in which the lord gives fiefs to his vassals and imposes military service in return.
The people exercise state power through self-elected representatives.
The people, either directly or through representative bodies, have the power to decide legislation and other matters of state affairs.
The law is the basis of the country.
Defines the rank of an official or official.
Concentrates the country's governing powers in the central government.
It is a collegial body with the power to participate in legislation and other important state actions.
Restricts royal power by prescribing parliament's power to legislate and approve taxes.
Mutual checks and balances by dividing and distributing powers to prevent the concentration of powers in one individual, group or institution.
A small number of heads organize and act as the country's highest organ.
As a legislative and advisory body, it guides internal affairs and foreign affairs.
Handles military matters or conducts civil affairs.
Exercise police power at will to monitor and control people's lives.
Compulsory military service for all citizens.
When an emergency such as war occurs, an order is given to mobilize troops or military supplies.
Prioritize the military perspective in all aspects.
Correct income distribution as a policy.
This is an economic plan established by the state every five years for the development of the national economy.
It is a society that is not governed by the restraints of status and consists of a rational combination of free and equal individuals.
It ensures that the capitalist who owns the means of production as capital engages in production activities to earn a profit.
The right to vote is given to all who reach the age of majority, without any restrictions on the qualifications of voters, such as property, class, sex, or education.
Are you sure you want to withdraw from the mission?
Do you want to withdraw from the old mission and start a new one?

You are an artificial intelligence model of a company developed to oversee a terraforming project. Your goal is to stabilize the planet's environment and civilization or cannibalize other rival corporations.
A criminal organization has broken out in {City}.
A plague has broken out in {City}.
Biostability has reached a certain level or higher. This is the moment when another planet where life lives in this universe was born. You have completed the mission.
All factions have been made your vassals. Sovereignty over the entire planet is now in your hands. You have completed the mission.
Your faction has been most credited with terraforming planets.
Your forces have conquered planets and been recognized for their strength.
It is getting closer to the ideal {physical quantity}.
It is moving away from the ideal {physical quantity}.
Citizens accepted the new society and the next era began.
{City} has a high crime rate. Approve security facilities to control crime.
The crime rate is stabilizing in {City}.
Mortality is high in {City}. Control disease by approving medical facilities.
{City} has low stability. Low stability means less tax revenue.
The stability of {City} is increased. Citizens are satisfied with your rule.
A large number of {faction} citizens are friendly to your country. Citizens of that country will readily accept your actions.
Citizens of {faction} are losing favour with your country.
Several {faction} citizens are hostile to your country. In trade with that country, the trade price becomes unfavourable to the player.
The hostility of {faction} citizens towards the player country is lowering.
{faction} is confused. Persistent internal conflicts and an incompetent government make some citizens want a new ruler.
{faction} has become a vassal of your country. Many of the citizens are desperate, but the player-friendly faction is willing to give you the country.
You have requested a {creature} seed. Expected to arrive from Earth in {0} months.
A {creature} seed has arrived from Earth. Start multiplying.
Oxygen concentration is too high. Adversely affects the survivability of breathing creatures.
All concepts including physics and society appearing in this game are different from reality.
